name: fullstack-chat-app
description: - User auth [x] - User profile [x]   - Edit profile [x]   - change profile picture [x] - Posts [x]   - Create ( text only or Add photo ) [x]   - Edit [x]   - Delete [x] - Other users [x]   - Add Friend [x]

scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
